title: About
description: Hi! I'm Albert, a graduating senior at PEA.
body:
Albert is a senior in Dow House at Phillips Exeter Academy. He’s originally from California, although he’s spent time living abroad in Shanghai and Suzhou, China as well.
Albert is passionate about space and robotics! He developed software for the MIT STAR Lab’s DemiSat last summer, is a Co-President of Exeter’s three robotics teams for SeaPerch, MATE, and FTC, and loves to whittle and tinker around with various electronics.
Albert co-founded the Public Forum Debate team at Exeter and is a three-time Nationals qualifier. He also speaks Chinese, English and Latin, and he’s currently learning Ancient Greek as well. He also knows a few more current languages in the form of programming languages: Python, Java, and a little C++. Please take a look around, and reach out if you have any comments or questions!

title: Building a Go-kart from Scratch
description: Built a two-stroke go-kart capable of reaching 35 mph
body:
Above is the final version of the go-kart, completed just in time for a few test-drives before COVID shut down campus.
When I started the Automotive Engineering Club with a few friends, we had intended it as a weekly space for us to come together to profess our love for cars and discuss hot topics like the latest advancements in regenerative breaking as well as Elon Musk and Tesla’s “100 hour work weeks.”
After a group visit to a local mechanic’s shop however, someone suggested building a car or motorcycle as a group, and after some debate, we settled on ideal compromise between complexity and practicality (we’re still highschoolers after all)—the go-kart.
A close-up of the engine after we first put it together and were testing its output: Here’s an image of a gokart racer in action:

title: The Underwater MATE robot
description: That time we built an underwater robot and did a lot of crisis management.
body: [The Van de Graaf Canon](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canons_of_page_construction#Van_de_Graaf_canon)## Mane refeci capiebant unda mulcebatVicta caducifer, malo vulnere contradicere aurato, ludit regale, voca! Retorsit colit est profanae esse virescerefurit nec; iaculi matertera et visa est, viribus. Divesque creatis, tecta novat collumque vulnus est, parvas. **Faces illo pepulere** tempus adest. Tendit flamma, ab opes virum sustinet, sidus sequendo urbis.Iubar proles corpore raptos vero auctor imperium; sed et huic: manus caeliLelegas tu lux. Verbis obstitit intus oblectamina fixis linguisque ausus sperareEchionides cornuaque tenent clausit possit. Omnia putatur. Praeteritae refertausus; ferebant e primus lora nutat, vici quae mea ipse. Et iter nil spectataevulnus haerentia iuste et exercebat, sui et.Eurytus Hector, materna ipsumque ut Politen, nec, nate, ignari, vernum cohaesit sequitur. Vel **mitis temploque** vocatus, inque alis, *oculos nomen* non silvis corpore coniunx ne displicet illa. Crescunt non unus, vidit visa quantum inmiti flumina mortis facto sic: undique a alios vincula sunt iactata abdita! Suspenderat ego fuit tendit: luna, ante urbemPropoetides **parte**.--
